column4: lucid will not upgrade and it keeps telling me about a dependency issue but refuses to fix it
with muscore
and it won't let me remove it
what can i do
post the exact output of the error somwhere, and include that here
well, the error message there seems to tell you the problem. Delete that file, and you might be off to the races.
well, move it instead.
soething like sudo mv /usr/share/mscore-0.9/templates/instruments_de.xml /home/your_user
then try again
show me a new paste. and also the output of ls /usr/share/mscore-0.9/templates/
well, your computer is either lying, or you did things in the wrong order. Somehow apt thinks the file you moved is still in the same place
it's not there. try the apt thing again
ya, it should at least complain about a different thing.
_de?
the error is: trying to overwrite '/usr/share/mscore-0.9/templates/instruments_de.xml', which is also in package mscore-common 0:0.9.4+dfsg-1
so we moved the file, is it still complaining about the same file?
well, you would probably do sudo aptitude remove mscore-common
same error?
does it let you sudo aptitude remove musescore?
ha. worked?
sweet.
